title: (x) NBC's new corporate typeface - SF Chaerilidae {Ben}
content:
I was watching NBC tonight and noticed they have a new look. The new face that they are using looks great. Anyone know what its is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019225903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hdr_home_nbcbroadband.gif)
  
Sorry for the low-res pic, I just grabbed it from the site. Take a look @ [www.NBC.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019225903/http:/www.nbc.com/ "www.NBC.com"). Thanks in advance...
 [‹ (x) Let's Live Abroad - Mister Earl {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019225903/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15989 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Looking for a (free) font that has a soccer ball in it ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019225903/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15981 "Go to next forum topic")
author: serum67 designlab

comments.content: So the mighty NBC use a derivative of a freeware font?

How do you think rich people get that way?

hhp
